member.name: T:ApplicationAccess.Persistence.IAccessManagerEventBuffer`4
member.summary: Defines methods to buffer events which change the structure of an AccessManager class.
member.typeparam: The type of users in the application managed by the AccessManager.
The type of groups in the application managed by the AccessManager.
The type of components in the application managed by the AccessManager.
The type of levels of access which can be assigned to an application component.

member.name: M:ApplicationAccess.Persistence.IAccessManagerEventBuffer`4.Flush
member.summary: Flushes the buffers... i.e. transfers all stored events to another event processor, and clears all items stored in the buffers.

member.name: T:ApplicationAccess.Persistence.IAccessManagerEventBufferFlushStrategy`4
member.summary: Defines methods to track/monitor the contents of an IAccessManagerEventBuffer implementation, and an event to flush the buffers.
member.typeparam: The type of users in the application managed by the AccessManager.
The type of groups in the application managed by the AccessManager.
The type of components in the application managed by the AccessManager.
The type of levels of access which can be assigned to an application component.

member.name: E:ApplicationAccess.Persistence.IAccessManagerEventBufferFlushStrategy`4.BufferFlushed
member.summary: Occurs when the buffers are flushed... i.e. when events stored in the buffers are processed.

member.name: P:ApplicationAccess.Persistence.IAccessManagerEventBufferFlushStrategy`4.UserEventBufferItemCount
member.summary: The number of user events stored in the buffer.

member.name: P:ApplicationAccess.Persistence.IAccessManagerEventBufferFlushStrategy`4.GroupEventBufferItemCount
member.summary: The number of group events stored in the buffer.

member.name: P:ApplicationAccess.Persistence.IAccessManagerEventBufferFlushStrategy`4.UserToGroupMappingEventBufferItemCount
member.summary: The number of user to group mapping events stored in the buffer.

member.name: P:ApplicationAccess.Persistence.IAccessManagerEventBufferFlushStrategy`4.GroupToGroupMappingEventBufferItemCount
member.summary: The number of group to group mapping events stored in the buffer.

member.name: P:ApplicationAccess.Persistence.IAccessManagerEventBufferFlushStrategy`4.UserToApplicationComponentAndAccessLevelMappingEventBufferItemCount
member.summary: The number of user to application component and access level mapping events stored in the buffer.

member.name: P:ApplicationAccess.Persistence.IAccessManagerEventBufferFlushStrategy`4.GroupToApplicationComponentAndAccessLevelMappingEventBufferItemCount
member.summary: The number of group to application component and access level mapping events stored in the buffer.

member.name: P:ApplicationAccess.Persistence.IAccessManagerEventBufferFlushStrategy`4.EntityTypeEventBufferItemCount
member.summary: The number of entity type events stored in the buffer.

member.name: P:ApplicationAccess.Persistence.IAccessManagerEventBufferFlushStrategy`4.EntityEventBufferItemCount
member.summary: The number of entity events stored in the buffer.

member.name: P:ApplicationAccess.Persistence.IAccessManagerEventBufferFlushStrategy`4.UserToEntityMappingEventBufferItemCount
member.summary: The number of user to entity mapping events stored in the buffer.

member.name: P:ApplicationAccess.Persistence.IAccessManagerEventBufferFlushStrategy`4.GroupToEntityMappingEventBufferItemCount
member.summary: The number of group to entity mapping events stored in the buffer.

member.name: T:ApplicationAccess.Persistence.IAccessManagerEventPersister`4
member.summary: Defines methods to persist events which change the structure of an AccessManager class to permanent storage.
member.typeparam: The type of users in the application managed by the AccessManager.
The type of groups in the application managed by the AccessManager.
The type of components in the application managed by the AccessManager.
The type of levels of access which can be assigned to an application component.

member.name: M:ApplicationAccess.Persistence.IAccessManagerEventPersister`4.Load
member.summary: Loads the access manager from persistent storage.

member.name: T:ApplicationAccess.Persistence.IAccessManagerTemporalEventPersister`4
member.summary: Defines methods to persist events which change the structure of an AccessManager class to permanent storage. Designed to operate behind a component which buffers the events, and hence methods include a unique sequence number for each event, and the date/time in the past when the even occurred.
member.typeparam: The type of users in the application managed by the AccessManager.
The type of groups in the application managed by the AccessManager.
The type of components in the application managed by the AccessManager.
The type of levels of access which can be assigned to an application component.

member.name: M:ApplicationAccess.Persistence.IAccessManagerTemporalEventPersister`4.AddUser(`0,System.Int64,System.DateTime)
member.summary: Adds a user.
member.param: The user to add.
The ordinal sequence number of the event.
The historic date and time that the user was added.

member.name: M:ApplicationAccess.Persistence.IAccessManagerTemporalEventPersister`4.RemoveUser(`0,System.Int64,System.DateTime)
member.summary: Removes a user.
member.param: The user to remove.
The ordinal sequence number of the event.
The historic date and time that the user was removed.
